GCON.MX.summary: Grupo Catalana Occidente, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides insurance products and services worldwide. The company operates through Traditional Business and Credit Insurance Business segments. The company offers multirisk products and services related to home and family, stores, communities, offices, and SMEs; life insurance products, such as life risk, life savings, pension plans, and investment funds, as well as funeral, death, and health insurance; and automobile insurance coverage products for cars or transport fleets. It also provides other insurance products, such as industrial products, engineering, accidents, and liability; and credit insurance and reinsurance. Grupo Catalana Occidente, S.A. markets its products primarily under the Seguros Catalana Occidente, Plus Ultra Seguros, Seguros Bilbao, NorteHispana Seguros, CrÃ©dito y CauciÃ³n, Atradius, and Atradius Re brands. The company was founded in 1864 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain. Grupo Catalana Occidente, S.A. is a subsidiary of INOC, S.A.
